item.title: Improving Intonation
item.description: Micro-Lesson: Mastering Intonation Intonation-playing in tune-can be a challenge for every musician, no matter your experience level. Here are some practical tips to help you develop a more accurate ear and improve your ensembleâ€™s sound:
